awd_titl_txt: Applied Optics and Light Instrumentation for Graphic Art
awd_abstract_narration: This proposal addresses the problem of Applied Optics and Light                 Instrumentation for the Graphic Arts student.  The program is                   directed toward a non-science and Publication audience.  It is                  proposed to set up experiments using equipment from the graphics                industry rather than the "traditional" introductory physics                     experiment in lights.  This is a program which should contribute                to an increase in scientific literacy.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       //
